message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. Let me know if that works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $15,000 is a bit outside my budget.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $8,500 right now. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $13,500. Let me know if that works for you!

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $13,500 is still a little too high for me.  Let's meet in the middle at $10,000. This is a fair price for both of us, and it allows me to purchase the product within my budget.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, I understand that $10,000 is a bit low for me, but I want to keep the negotiation going. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm counteroffering at $14,000. I think this is a fair price, considering the value the product brings to you. Let me know if this works for you!
